channel.title: Custom Defenders (e.g. bronze defender, steel defender etc.)

item.title: Custom Defenders (e.g. bronze defender, steel defender etc.)
item.dc:creator: @monkeykid300 monkeykid300
item.description:
@monkeykid300 wrote:

Are you an idiot! Bronze,steel,black,mith,adamant,rune are all REAL jagex defenders ever been a high lvl member on rs didnt think so you nub

If your going to flame and spam like that GTFO off of this forum.

Anyway nice defenders the coding was a little sloppy though but i can fix that thanks only problem is for the defender you also need the model for it which i doubt most people have.

Read full topic

item.source: Custom Defenders (e.g. bronze defender, steel defender etc.)

item.title: Custom Defenders (e.g. bronze defender, steel defender etc.)
item.dc:creator: @LOLMFAO LOLMFAO
item.description:
@LOLMFAO wrote:

I know I’m not the first one to make these but I know a lot of people that downloaded the BoratScape source will want it or whatever so add these into your class8.java in the client folder then where you see #### change that to what you want the ID to be save and compile

Bronze Defender

if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 28; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 74; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 5652; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 5652; class8.anInt174 = 4671; class8.anInt181 = 490; class8.anInt190 = 344; class8.anInt198 = 192; class8.anInt204 = 138; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 20; class8.anInt165 = 4672; class8.anInt200 = 4672; class8.anInt175 = 56; class8.anInt197 = 116; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Bronze Defender"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A defensive weapon.".getBytes(); }

Steel Defender

if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 28; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 74; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 41; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 41; class8.anInt174 = 4671; class8.anInt181 = 490; class8.anInt190 = 344; class8.anInt198 = 192; class8.anInt204 = 138; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 20; class8.anInt165 = 4672; class8.anInt200 = 4672; class8.anInt175 = 56; class8.anInt197 = 116; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Steel defender"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A defensive weapon.".getBytes(); }

Mithril Defender

if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 28; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 74; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 43297; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 43297; class8.anInt174 = 4671; class8.anInt181 = 490; class8.anInt190 = 344; class8.anInt198 = 192; class8.anInt204 = 138; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 20; class8.anInt165 = 4672; class8.anInt200 = 4672; class8.anInt175 = 56; class8.anInt197 = 116; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Mithril defender"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A defensive weapon.".getBytes(); }

Adament Defender

if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 28; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 74; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 21662; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 21662; class8.anInt174 = 4671; class8.anInt181 = 490; class8.anInt190 = 344; class8.anInt198 = 192; class8.anInt204 = 138; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 20; class8.anInt165 = 4672; class8.anInt200 = 4672; class8.anInt175 = 56; class8.anInt197 = 116; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Adament defender"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A defensive weapon.".getBytes(); }

Rune Defender

if(i == ####)  
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 28; 
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 74; 
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 38676; 
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 38313; 
class8.anInt174 = 4671;
class8.anInt181 = 490;
class8.anInt190 = 344;
class8.anInt198 = 192;
class8.anInt204 = 138;
class8.anInt199 = -1;
class8.anInt169 = 1;
class8.anInt194 = 20;
class8.anInt165 = 4672;
class8.anInt200 = 4672;
class8.anInt175 = 56;
class8.anInt197 = 116;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.aBoolean176 = false;
class8.aString170 = "Rune defender";
class8.aByteArray178 = "A defensive weapon.".getBytes();

Dragon Defender

if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 28; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 74; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 38676; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 924; class8.anInt174 = 4671; class8.anInt181 = 490; class8.anInt190 = 344; class8.anInt198 = 192; class8.anInt204 = 138; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 20; class8.anInt165 = 4672; class8.anInt200 = 4672; class8.anInt175 = 56; class8.anInt197 = 116; class8.aString170 = "Dragon defender"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A defensive weapon.".getBytes();

~-Galkon-~ ----- for his recoloring [tut]
~-Me-~ ----- for doing the actual work
